description:
Learn to write wererom and make lots of money!

Paranormal romance is among today’s leading fiction genres. Some claim it’s a saturated market, but we know better. The trick is knowing which sub-genre to write in, and today you’ve found it!

In this course you’ll learn everything you need to write your first werewolf romance. We’ll cover everything from the basics all the way to advanced marketing, and tons of stuff in between. By the time you’re done, you’ll be able to leap into this genre, and earn more than anyone who doesn’t take this course.

FEATURES:

1+ hours of video instruction

PDF Expansions on every topic

Tons of additional resources

Quizzes to test your knowledge

Start writing great wererom instantly!

WHAT THIS COURSE IS, AND ISN'T

This is an introductory course for writers who want to get started in the paranormal sub-genre, werewolf romance. The instructor, Lex DeVille a.k.a. "Sinister Lex", isn't hoity toity and doesn't waste time with filler material. Instead he gets right down to the nitty gritty, so you can start earning as fast as possible.

Stop wasting time, step up, and enroll right now!
title: Get Paid to Learn to Write Werewolf Romance!
